title: read params of int variable in ida?
content: I have located a known int variable that belongs to a tls library, the variable has parameters I need to look at to find the name of another variable I need. Is it possible to read the parameters?

comments.text: mbedtls_ecdh_read_params is not a variable but a function. You first need to locate its code inside of the binary, it could also be loaded from a DLL
"int variables" don't have parameters, so you can't read them, because they don't exist.
@mimak wdym its code, i thought the code would be where the definition of the function would hold the parameters
@Botytec that's exactly what you should find and debug to read the parameter values
@mimak do you think what i sent is the definition of the function?
